text: Kedar "Bud" Pyatt was Project Orion's chief mathematician. He worked on nuclear physics calculations for the project. He created mathematical models of the processes that were occurring, then setting up equations to simulate those processes and calculate the behavior. Was born in Louisburg, North Carolina. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American mathematicians Category:Yale University alumni Category:1933 births
title: Kedar "Bud" Pyatt
